context: If I want to put this on my 360 can my friend put it on HIS Xbox 1..?

response: No you do not have to have Kinect. However if you do it allows you to use voice to navigate the menus. I personally do not use it I just use my controller and is does not affect any of my gameplay experience.

context: Just Dance Nintendo is Ok to use with regulat TV?
response: Yea, as long as u have the plugs to hook up the wii on your tv its fine. It uses the red whith and yellow wires. If your tv dosnt have these u can buy a box that hooks into the cable feed at walmart, radio shack, etc.

context: Does the balance board work well on carpet?
response: Yes, we use it on carpet and it works perfectly. There are foot extensions that come with it specifically designed to allow it to work on carpet.

context: im going to get an Xbox one do you recommend this card to play online
response: I have both an Xbox 360 and an Xbox One, and when you use this for either, it works for both. Xbox only sees the numbers on the card. The printing of "360" on the outside means nothing to the system.
